content: coralee scarf information yarn 100 g fingering yarn kimono by querstricker 56% extrafine merino/ 44% superkid mohair 100 g/360 m - hand dyed needles 3 75 mm circular needle 60-80 cm long or size needed to get gauge gauge 24 sts 10 cm and 35 row 10 cm in sockinette after washing keep in mind gauge is not critical in this project but will affect yardage and final size when different size 26 x 160 cm see measurements material tapestry needle notes coralee scarf is a knitted small scarf starts and ends with a triangle if you have any questions please contact me kalmknit@online de hope you enjoy the instructions copyrights by kalmknit - kalmknit@online de f or personal use only any reproduction or distribution is s trictly forbidden page 1 of 16 abbreviations instruction bef before chart 1 co cast on see also chart 1 row 1 60 k knit co 7 sts k2tog knit 2 stitches together row 1 k7 m1l make one left see specials row 2 slpw3 k slpw3 m1r make one right see specials row 3 k7 p purl row 4 slpw3 k slpw3 repeat repeat row 5 k7 rs right side row 6 slpw3 k slpw3 sk2p slip one sts knitwise knit two together row 7 k3 m1r k m1l k3 pass slipped stitch over row 8 slpw3 k3 slpw3 slpw3 slip three stitches purlwise with yarn in row 9 k9 front row 10 slpw3 k3 slpw3 st s stitch/stitches row 11 k9 ssk slip slip knit slip two stitches one at a row 12 slpw3 k3 slpw3 time knitwise to the righthand needle row 13 k4 m1r k m1l k4 return stitches to left-hand needle in row 14 slpw3 k5 slpw3 turned position and knit them together row 15 k11 through the back loops row 16 slpw3 k5 slpw3 ws wrong side row 17 k11 yo yarn over row 18 slpw3 k5 slpw3 row 19 k5 m1r k m1l k5 specials row 20 slpw3 k7 slpw3 ssk https //youtu be/0iiu9ej-lgo row 21 k13 m1l make one left with left needle pick up row 22 slpw3 k7 slpw3 horizontal bar from front and knit 1 through row 23 k13 back loop row 24 slpw3 k7 slpw3 m1r make one right with left needle pick up row 25 k6 m1r k m1l k6 horizontal bar from back and knit 1 row 26 slpw3 k3 p3 k3 slpw3 row 27 k15 measurements row 28 slpw3 k3 p3 k3 slpw3 row 29 k15 row 30 slpw3 k3 p3 k3 slpw3 row 31 k6 m1r k3 m1l k6 row 32 slpw3 k3 p5 k3 slpw3 row 33 k17 row 34 slpw3 k3 p5 k3 slpw3 row 35 k17 row 36 slpw3 k3 p5 k3 slpw3 row 37 k6 m1r k5 m1l k6 row 38 slpw3 k3 p7 k3 slpw3 row 39 k19 row 40 slpw3 k3 p7 k3 slpw3 row 41 k19 row 42 slpw3 k3 p7 k3 slpw3 row 43 k6 m1r k7 m1l k6 legend for
